channel.title: Help a newb out
channel.description:
Kay i need help with the automatic donation system to give you your junk in game after you donate
I KNOW I SAW A TUTORIAL but i lost it i sware i read every post on moparscape i would rather be taking a week straight of math ... i think i went up 5 grade lvls in reading ... ANYWAY i need someone to link me a tutorial on the automatic donation system ill love you forever ... and ever ....!
